Uses of Package
bayes

  • Packages that use bayes 
    Package Description
    bayes
    The package that offers an implementation of Dynamic Bayesian Networks.
    gui
    The Graphical User Interface package.
  • Classes in bayes used by bayes 
    Class and Description
    BayesGraph
    Interface which extends the Graph interface and represents a bayesian graph.
    BayesianNetwork
    Interface that represents a Bayesian Network.
    BayesStaticGraph
    Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph Particularly it represents a static bayesian network which describes dependencies between random variables at a certain time interval
    BayesTransitionGraph
    Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph.
    Score
    Score is an abstract class that provides implementation for calculating scores, estimates and counts.
    TensorToArray
    Abstract class that cannot be instantiated that provides two methods for dealing with tensor data.
  • Classes in bayes used by gui 
    Class and Description
    BayesianNetwork
    Interface that represents a Bayesian Network.
